main event: A witness observed a bright pulsating light in the sky while outside their home in Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on two different dates, August 3 and August 8, 1961., The object was described as brighter than a star and pulsated., The observer reported the light hovering and then moving rapidly in a northwest direction., The sighting lasted for 30 minutes on August 3 and around 50 minutes on August 8., No photographs or visual elements were included in the report.
witness description: A civilian who reported the sighting to the Air Force.
